fields.name: TradeLicenseError
fields.fieldText: Uploading a valid Trade License document is mandatory to complete the registration process.

value.stringValue: SELECT ECSS_Expiry_Date__c, ECSS_Expiry_Date_Required__c,ECSS_SubType__c, Status__c, DocumentType__c,ECSS_PublicLink__c,ECSS_Required__c FROM Document__c WHERE Account__c =: oppID
